rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows and natural light. Incorporates Vastu elements by aligning seating towards the south-east for positive energy.
Integrated dining space near the kitchen area, optimized for social interactions while maintaining a traditional Kerala aesthetic.
Functional modern kitchen designed with ample counter space and storage. Includes a small pantry area aligned per Vastu guidelines.
Master bedroom with a private balcony, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and Vastu compliant positioning (North or East).
Secondary bedroom with a spacious balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows. The room is placed to ensure maximum sunlight exposure.
